strings.SIGMA-identification: Minimum one keyword must be selected from the thesaurus ‘SIGMA-Years’ dated on 2014-05-06
strings.NoSIGMAThemeSelected:
No English keyword found from the SIGMA Sites thesaurus dated on 2014-05-06. An English keyword: is found from the SIGMA Years thesaurus dated on 2014-05-06.
Minimum one keyword must be selected from the thesaurus ‘SIGMA-DataTypes’ dated on 2014-05-06 SIGMA DataTypes thesaurus not found.
Minimum one keyword must be selected from the thesaurus ‘SIGMA-Regions’ dated on 2014-05-06
General SC-1: gmd:MD_Metadata/gmd:fileIdentifier (Iso element nr. 2) has to be present and not empty. gmd:fileIdentifier is missing or empty gmd:fileIdentifier is present:
General SC-2: MD_Metadata.referenceSystemInfo/*/RS_identifier/code (ISO element nr 207) has to be present and not empty. Reference system missing. Horizontal or vertical reference system should be documented. Reference system code missing or empty. Horizontal or vertical reference system should be documented. Horizontal or vertical reference system code is present:
General SC-3: organisationName (ISO-element 376) is present within each occurence of CI_ResponsibleParty and not empty. Name of the responsible organisation is not present or empty. Name of the responsible organisation is present:
At least one dutch keyword should be present out of the 'GEMET - INSPIRE themes, version 1.0' thesaurus’ and dated 2008-06-01 if the MD_Metadata.language equals NL (ISO-element 55) INSPIRE Theme thesaurus not found.
